page.title: 06Industries
page.content: Milborne Port was once famous for its {leather industry}.There were many local factories dealing in leather goods.Over the years the businesses have folded and all that is left are the following:- a) {the Tannery}which deals with treatment of all types of leather and employs a considerable work force of local people. b) {Nichols}a factory dealing in the preparation of lamb skins. c) {the Horseman centre}which produces harnesses and saddles. There is also a medium sized {printing {works}which will shortly be closing down and moving to Yeovil(see "Changes in Milborne Port).
